name: molly waffle blanket
notes:
**molly waffle blanket** // an oversized crochet throw blanket in textured waffle stitch with chunky color blocked sections

calling all blanket lovers! check out the chunky molly waffle blanket, a color-blocked throw that’s ready to rock your cozy world. this design uses analogous colors to create a soothing vibe, perfect for zen relaxation. the adorable picot border adds just the right touch of cute, while the textured stitch is perfect for fidgety fingers – you won’t want to stop touching it. 

**materials**
-1480 yards of hue + me yarn (11 skeins in 3 colors) - substitute the bulky weight yarn of your choice
-9mm crochet hook
-scissors
-tapestry needle
-steam blocking supplies

**techniques**
-foundation single crochet
-double crochet
-post stitches
-crochet color changes
-picots
-adding a border

**sizes**
one size - project made with recommended yarn makes a blanket that is 58” long x 45” wide

find the free version of this project **[here][1]**
